EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners, Response to Inquiry (1312994568.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners, Response to Inquiry (1312994568.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Thomas,
I wanted to send you an email and follow up to my voicemail from earlier I’ve enclosed a few things as summary to our call:
• Link to our benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits
• Link to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Welcome_to_MBO_Partners.pdf
• Link to the most common types of non-billable expenses you can submit to us: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_List.pdf
I look forward to speaking with you. You can schedule an appropriate time in my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Regards,
Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
